SELECT a.id AS good_id, a.g_code, a.g_name, a.py_code, a.typeName, a.specification, a.unitName, SUM(a.purchase_count) AS purchase_count, SUM(a.purchase_amount) AS purchase_amount, SUM(a.refund_count) AS refund_count,SUM(a.refund_amount) AS refund_amount, (SUM(a.purchase_count) - SUM(a.refund_count)) AS total_count, (SUM(a.purchase_amount) - SUM(a.refund_amount)) AS total_amount FROM ( SELECT g.id, g.g_code, g.g_name, g.py_code, (CASE WHEN o.order_type = 1 THEN SUM(og.good_num) ELSE 0 END) AS purchase_count, (CASE WHEN o.order_type = 4 THEN SUM(og.good_num) ELSE 0 END) AS refund_count, (CASE WHEN o.order_type = 1 THEN SUM(og.total_price) ELSE 0 END) AS purchase_amount, (CASE WHEN o.order_type = 4 THEN SUM(og.total_price) ELSE 0 END) AS refund_amount, t.gt_name AS typeName, g.specification, u.gu_name AS unitName FROM tb_goods_info g LEFT JOIN tb_goods_type t ON t.id = g.type LEFT JOIN tb_goods_unit u ON u.id = g.unit LEFT JOIN tb_order_goods og ON og.good_id= g.id LEFT JOIN tb_orders o ON o.id = og.order_id WHERE 1=1
AND g.g_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.gName}, '%')
AND g.g_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.gCode}, '%')
AND g.py_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.pyCode}, '%')
GROUP BY g.id, o.order_type ) a GROUP BY a.id
